filmography.title: Magnificent Obsession
filmography.role_description: A reckless playboy who inadvertently causes a woman's blindness and becomes a surgeon to cure her; Taylor's breakout role.
filmography.plot: A wealthy idler is responsible for the death of a beloved doctor and the blindness of his widow, leading him to seek redemption through medicine.

filmography.title: Broadway Melody of 1936
filmography.role_description: A young Broadway producer who is looking for a star for his new show, unaware that his high school sweetheart is the perfect fit.
filmography.plot: A producer tries to find a lead for his show while his old flame poses as a French celebrity to win the part.

filmography.title: Camille
filmography.role_description: A young, romantic Frenchman who falls deeply in love with a courtesan, played by Greta Garbo, in this tragic love story.
filmography.plot: A courtesan falls in love with a young promise but leaves him to save his reputation, all while succumbing to tuberculosis.

filmography.title: A Yank at Oxford
filmography.role_description: A cocky American track star who receives a scholarship to Oxford University and clashes with British traditions.
filmography.plot: An arrogant American athlete goes to Oxford University, where he learns humility and teamwork after initial friction with students.

filmography.title: Three Comrades
filmography.role_description: One of three German WWI veterans trying to survive the post-war depression, who falls in love with a dying woman.
filmography.plot: Three friends try to make a living in post-WWI Germany while one of them falls for a woman with a tragic secret.

filmography.title: Waterloo Bridge
filmography.role_description: A British officer who reminisces about his tragic WWI romance with a ballerina he met during an air raid.
filmography.plot: A ballet dancer and an army officer fall in love during an air raid, but the war tears them apart with tragic consequences.

filmography.title: Flight Command
filmography.role_description: A rookie pilot who joins a famous naval squadron and struggles to win the respect of his fellow flyers.
filmography.plot: A new cadet joins the 'Hellcats' squadron and must prove his worth to the veteran pilots and his commander.

filmography.title: Billy the Kid
filmography.role_description: The famous outlaw portrayed as a misunderstood youth who turns to violence to avenge a friend's death.
filmography.plot: A childhood friend of Pat Garrett becomes a notorious outlaw, forcing the lawman to hunt him down.

filmography.title: Johnny Eager
filmography.role_description: A ruthless, cold-blooded gangster posing as a taxi driver to manipulate his parole officer.
filmography.plot: A parolee masquerading as a cab driver runs a gambling syndicate and seduces a sociology student to get leverage on her D.A. stepfather.

filmography.title: Bataan
filmography.role_description: A tough sergeant leading a doomed patrol to destroy a bridge and delay the Japanese advance in the Philippines.
filmography.plot: A group of thirteen American soldiers try to defend a bridge on the Bataan Peninsula against the Japanese army.

filmography.title: Undercurrent
filmography.role_description: A wealthy industrialist whose charming facade hides a dark secret about his missing brother, creating menace for his new wife.
filmography.plot: A woman marries a businessman and begins to suspect he may have murdered his brother.

filmography.title: High Wall
filmography.role_description: A brain-damaged war veteran confined to an asylum who must recover his memory to prove he didn't kill his wife.
filmography.plot: A pilot suffering from a brain injury is accused of murdering his wife and must clear his name with the help of a doctor.

filmography.title: The Bribe
filmography.role_description: A federal agent investigating war surplus smuggling in South America who falls for a suspect's wife.
filmography.plot: A federal agent is sent to break up a racket in Central America but falls in love with the singer wife of one of the crooks.

filmography.title: Conspirator
filmography.role_description: A British Guards officer who is secretly a Soviet spy, creating a deadly dilemma for his young American wife.
filmography.plot: An American woman discovers that her British husband is actually a spy for the Soviet Union.

filmography.title: Devil's Doorway
filmography.role_description: A Shoshone Indian and Civil War hero who returns home to find he loses his land due to discriminatory laws.
filmography.plot: A Native American Civil War hero fights to keep his land against sheep farmers and bigoted laws.

filmography.title: Quo Vadis
filmography.role_description: A Roman commander who falls in love with a Christian slave girl during the tyrannical reign of Emperor Nero.
filmography.plot: A Roman commander falls in love with a Christian hostage as Emperor Nero burns Rome and blames the Christians.

filmography.title: Westward the Women
filmography.role_description: A cynical wagon master hired to lead a wagon train of 150 women across the dangerous frontier to California.
filmography.plot: A trail guide escorts a wagon train of women across the Old West to find husbands in California.

filmography.title: Ivanhoe
filmography.role_description: A chivalrous Saxon knight who fights to restore King Richard to the throne and clear his name.
filmography.plot: A knight returns from the Crusades and seeks to restore the throne to King Richard while caught in a romantic triangle.

filmography.title: Above and Beyond
filmography.role_description: The real-life pilot who commands the mission to drop the atomic bomb on Hiroshima, exploring the personal toll of his duty.
filmography.plot: The story of Paul Tibbets, the pilot of the Enola Gay, and the strain the top-secret mission placed on his marriage.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Motion Picture Story

filmography.title: Knights of the Round Table
filmography.role_description: The bravest knight of the Round Table whose forbidden love for Queen Guinevere threatens Camelot.
filmography.plot: King Arthur's rule is threatened by the adulterous love between Sir Lancelot and Queen Guinevere.

filmography.title: All the Brothers Were Valiant
filmography.role_description: A responsible whaling captain who clashes with his adventurous and reckless brother over duty and a woman.
filmography.plot: Two brothers on a whaling ship clash over command, a woman, and a bag of pearls.

filmography.title: Rogue Cop
filmography.role_description: A corrupt police detective who seeks redemption and revenge after his honest brother is murdered by the mob.
filmography.plot: A crooked cop on the take turns against the mob when they murder his brother.

filmography.title: The Last Hunt
filmography.role_description: A sadistic, obsessive buffalo hunter who represents the destruction of the Old West; a rare villainous role.
filmography.plot: Two buffalo hunters clash over their different values and a Native American woman during the final days of the great herds.

filmography.title: Party Girl
filmography.role_description: A mob lawyer with a crippled leg who tries to leave the criminal life for the love of a showgirl.
filmography.plot: A lawyer for the mob tries to quit the rackets when he falls in love with a dancer, but the boss won't let him go.

filmography.title: The Law and Jake Wade
filmography.role_description: A former outlaw turned marshal who is forced by his old partner to lead him to a buried stash of money.
filmography.plot: An outlaw forces his old partner, who has gone straight, to help him find buried money.
